trends: There have been no other sightings in West Norriton
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw 5 or 6 objects near each other, 2 or 3 couldve been planes but two have NEVER seen before
divs: sighting details*(name deleted--cms\sg) and i pulled over when i saw something near the moon (which looked lower than normal). the object left a cloud behind...it was ascending upward and fast. that is what made me pull over. *(name deleted--cms\sg) thought it was initially a plane but then it shot across the sky towards us and then went upward again. we next saw 2 in the same area appear from nowhere (these looked like planes, they had the red and white blinking lights a plane has) but only one made noise? i saw another object which appeared out of nowhere almost (or maybe i didn't see which direction it came from). this object was the 2nd object that i saw go completley upward. the objects weren't a completley look of a flying saucer, but they did have a bit of a circle shape. it was something like a square and circle kind of object...this one had more lights, they looked like they were red and white. i have never seen objects move this fast...wasn't like a plane or a jet, and they disappeared pretty quick.
